channel.title: 56k-Hype
channel.description:
[b][size=24pt]About[/b] [i]I've named my server 56k-Hype for two reasons: 56k because I'm on a 56k dial-up connection and Hype because I initially was going to develop a Hyperion server, but decided against it; kept the name though as I thought it sounded cool. I am developing 56k-Hype as a cleverly balanced PK server (because this is one of the most fun aspects of RuneScape private servers). I also plan to take full advantage of the combat system. Apart from PKing of course, 56k-Hype will have skilling, minigames, new and original activities/things to do, quests and lots of information so that you know what you are doing and where to go. The source is Project No-Doze, created by killamess - I highly reccommend the source as it has the most beautiful of combat systems. Better than Pali's in my opinion. Best one I've seen so far. I chose Project No-Doze for the combat (because I believe this is the most fun and important part of a private server), it has the basic core system for skilling, dialogues via XML, object spawning via XML, MySQL login, MySQL npcspawns, MySQL npcdrops, and various other things. I haven't worked out how to really use the XML files yet though.[/i] [b][size=24pt]Progress Log[/b] [size=8pt][b][u][Sunday 27th March 2011][/b] -Downloaded the source -Got MySQL up and running successfully [b][u][Monday 28th March 2011][/b] -New home (Varrock dummy room). -New starter kit (bronze dagger, leather gloves, leather boots and 10k coins). -First time login home (once you leave you cannot return), Weaponsmaster's weapon cache. -Disabled door and hay stack AFK training, kept dummy AFK training (70gp and 70XP for every hit; hits are looped). -Replaced the cache (fixed Varrock's center ground). [b][u][Tuesday 29th March 2011][/b] -Fixed login problem (kept appearing at Varrock east bank even though home was set for weapons cache). -Disabled the set trade restrictions between playerRights. -AFK training no longer gives HP XP. -You can now have melee, magic and range prayers all activated simultaneously (but not of the same sort). -Added over 100 npcdrops. -Added some NPCs (Ash Caves and around Varrock). -New teleports: Home (Varrock dummy room), Lumbridge, Falador, Camelot and Ardougne, and then on the ancient spellbook: Paddewwa = Home; Senntisten = Seers' village; Kharyrll = King Lathas' camp; Lassar = Lava maze; Dareeyak = Draynor village; Carrallangar = Crandor; Annakarl = Al kharid and Ghorrock = Grand tree. They all have the correct level and rune requirements but with added XP bonuses. [b][u][Thursday 31st March 2011][/b] -Decided against the teleport requirements, now you can teleport anywhere at any level (no XP rewarded). -Still adding NPCs with complete drop tables (2 days worth so far). -Lowered the amount of runes for the weapons cache spawns. [/size] [b][size=24pt]Current Plans[/b] [i]I want NPCs absolutely everywhere with complete drop tables. Thousands and thousands of items obtainable via NPC drops, shops, ground spawns and doing other activites, making it rare to come across someone with the same outfit as you. I don't want everyone running around in Bandos. I am currently adding the spawns and drops around the map now.[/i]
//**Lesser demon**// Ashes, Mithril seeds (50), Mithril ore (15), Mithril thrownaxe (50), Mithril dart (50), Mithril javelin (50), Mithril knife (50), Mithril arrow (50), Mithril platelegs, Mithril plateskirt, Mithril chainbody, Mithril platebody, Mithril med helm, Mithril full helm, Mithril sq shield, Mithril kiteshield, Mithril dagger, Mithril spear, Mithril pickaxe, Mithril sword, Mithril longsword, Mithril 2h sword, Mithril scimitar, Mithril warhammer, Mithril axe, Mithril battleaxe, Mithril mace, Mithril bar (15), Mithril claws, Mithril halberd, Mithril boots, Mithril bolts, Mith c'bow, Mithril hasta, Rune med helm //**Greater demon**// Ashes, Mithril seeds (50), Mithril ore (15), Mithril thrownaxe (50), Mithril dart (50), Mithril javelin (50), Mithril knife (50), Mithril arrow (50), Mithril platelegs, Mithril plateskirt, Mithril chainbody, Mithril platebody, Mithril med helm, Mithril full helm, Mithril sq shield, Mithril kiteshield, Mithril dagger, Mithril spear, Mithril pickaxe, Mithril sword, Mithril longsword, Mithril 2h sword, Mithril scimitar, Mithril warhammer, Mithril axe, Mithril battleaxe, Mithril mace, Mithril bar (15), Mithril claws, Mithril halberd, Mithril boots, Mithril bolts, Mith c'bow, Mithril hasta, Rune full helm, Rune scimitar //**Black demon**// Dark dagger, Glowing dagger, Black knife (50), Ashes, Black platelegs, Black plateskirt, Black chainbody, Black platebody, Black med helm, Black full helm, Black sq shield, Black kiteshield, Black dagger, Black sword, Black longsword, Black 2h sword, Black scimitar, Black warhammer, Black axe, Black battleaxe, Black mace, Black claws, Black halberd, Black boots, Black spear, Silverlight (black), Black mask //**Abyssal demon**// Abyssal whip, Ashes, Prayer potion(1), Super attack(1), Super strength(1), Super defence(1), Ranging potion(1), Magic potion(1), Ring of wealth, Logs (250), Magic logs (25), Yew logs (50), Maple logs (75), Willow logs (100), Oak logs (150), Dragon med helm, Dragon sq shield, Dragon longsword, Dragon battleaxe, Dragon mace, Dragon halberd, Dragon platelegs, Dragon plateskirt, Dragon scimitar, Dragon dagger(p++), Dragon 2h sword //**Man and Woman**// Bones, Coins (10,15,25,50,250,1000), Bronze arrows (100), Tan cavalier, Dark cavalier, Black cavalier, Bronze axe, Bronze pickaxe, Man speak amulet, Mystery box, Bronze thrownaxe (100), Bronze dart (100), Bronze Javelin (100), Bronze knife (100) //**Guard**// Bronze med helm, Iron chainbody, Bronze sword, Steel sq shield, Leather boots, Coins (500,1250,5000,7800), Steel chainbody, Steel gauntlets, Steel thrownaxe (100), Steel dart (100), Steel Javelin (100), Steel knife (100), Steel arrows (150), Steel med helm, Bronze boots, Iron boots, Steel boots, Bones //**Monk**// Bones, Monk robe, Monk robe, Holy grail, Holy force, Holy symbol //**Dark wizard**// Dark robe, Black skirt, Ahrims hood, Fire runes (10,25,50), Water runes (10,25,50), Air runes (10,25,50), Earth runes (10,25,50), Mind runes (10,25,50), Body runes (10,25,50), Death runes (10,25,50), Nature runes (10,25,50), Chaos runes (10,25,50), Law runes (10,25,50), Cosmic runes (10,25,50), Blood runes (10,25,50), Soul runes (10), Rune essence (150), Magic potion(1), Amulet of magic, Bones //**White knight**// Bones, White claws, White battleaxe, White dagger, White halberd, White mace, White sword, White longsword, White 2h sword, White scimitar, White warhammer, White chainbody, White platebody, White boots, White med helm, White full helm, White platelegs, White plateskirt, White gloves, White sq shield, White kiteshield, Steel gauntlets, Steel platelegs, Steel plateskirt, Steel chainbody, Steel platebody, Steel med helm, Steel full helm, Steel sq shield, Steel kiteshield, Steel dagger, Steel spear, Steel pickaxe, Steel sword, Steel longsword, Steel 2h sword, Steel scimitar, Steel warhammer, Steel axe, Steel battleaxe, Steel mace, Steel bar (50), Steel claws, Steel halberd, Steel boots, Steel arrows (25), Coins (500,1000,4500), Amulet of defence, Amulet of power, Amulet of glory(4) //**Green dragon**// Dragon bones, Green dragonhide, Casket, Adamantite ore (15), Runite ore (5), Coal (125), Rune arrows (30), Earth runes (500), Rune platelegs, Rune plateskirt, Rune chainbody, Rune platebody, Rune med helm, Dragon med helm, Rune full helm, Rune kiteshield, Rune pickaxe, Rune axe, Green d'hide vamb, Green d'hide chaps, Green d'hide body //**King Black Dragon**// Dragon bones, Black dragonhide, Black d'hide vamb, Black d'hide chaps, Black d'hide body, Dragon med helm, Dragon sq shield, Uncut dragonstone (10), Dragon chainbody, Dragon platelegs, Dragon plateskirt, Dragonfire shield, Coins (150,000) //**Blue dragon**// Dragon bones, Blue dragonhide, Blue d'hide vamb, Blue d'hide chaps, Blue d'hide body, Water runes (600), Rune full helm, Rune platelegs, Rune plateskirt, Rune platebody, Rune kiteshield, Nature runes (35) //**Red dragon**// Dragon bones, Red dragonhide, Red d'hide vamb, Red d'hide chaps, Red d'hide body, Dragon platelegs, Dragon plateskirt, Dragon boots, Dragon sq shield, Blood runes (100), Dragon gloves
[i]I will also make the economy balanced. High end stuff has a rare percentage of being dropped, whereas Mithril for example, is moderately obtainable, so it's enough to sell to pures for decent cash, but not worthless that you have to leave it. There will be a massive variety of weapons and armours to choose from. Clue scrolls with a massive variety of rewards (unique to treasure trails). All, or at least the vast majority, of ladders, doors, caves, dungeons and portals to be interactive. A choice to go absolutely anywhere so people may find quiet spots to camp while they train. Secrets hidden around the entire world to throw people off, confuse them, get them thinking or to reward them for venturing so far away from places you'd expect. Nothing too over the top, but a little system that gives rewards for doing certain tasks/acheivements (i.e. killing 1000 Abyssal demons gives you double XP in Fletching for a day, stuff like that). Level 99's to be very special. Some examples I have in mind are 99 defence, you can spawn 4 body guards that surround and follow you and 99 Thieving you can pickpocket other players (with limitations of course). More to come...[/i] [b][size=24pt]Current Features[/b] [i]Please note, this features are not necessarily created by me. I'm just adding them as a whole.[/i] [b]Locations[/b] -Ash Cave. You slip down the manhole cover outside Varrock's Fancy-dress shop, and the dungeon contains a trail of ashes to follow and reveals certain types of monsters to kill. So far, there are Lesser demons, Greater demons, Black demons and Abyssal demons. -Ports. There's a Ghost Sailor outside every major port (Karamja, Kazhard, Phas. and Sarim). This is the way to get around the map faster (rather than walking). Will also be useful for when I implement clue scrolls. [b]Items[/b] -Holy grail. Get it as a rare drop from a monk and sell/alch it for a quick 750k. -Ring of wealth. Get it as a rare drop from an abyssal demon and sell/alch it for a quick 750k. [b]Magic[/b] -Perfect graphics (literally). -Perfect timers. -Perfect level and rune requirements (except teleports). -Steady leveling with generous rune spawns/drops. -Normal teleports are free to any level. Ancient teleports are free to any level but the letter on the teleport icon represents where you will go (i.e. Dareeyak = Draynor, Lassar = Lava maze etc.). -Low alc and High alch work perfectly. -Bind, snare and entangle work perfectly. -God spells work perfectly. -Teleblock works perfectly. her [i]Need to work on: Superheat, Telekinetic, Jewellery enchanting, Orb charging and teleother.[/i] [b]Miscellaneous[/b] -You can spawn a pet dog (German Shepherd) and it picks up valuable items you get from monsters for you. -NPCs cannot stand on top of one another , basically NPCs are clipped wiht one another and depending on the situation, if you are standing on top of an NPC and decide to interact with it, you or they are forced to move and face the NPC (just like RuneScape) - no more attacking a monster on the same tile as you. More features coming very soon... [b][size=24pt]Other Media[/b] Weapons cache, the starting area for stocking up before being teleported out by the Weaponsmaster. The items in my inventory are all that are obtainable - items on tables and crates are not pickable. [URL=http://img263.imageshack.us/i/weaponscache.png/][IMG]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/1206/weaponscache.png[/img][/URL] [b][size=24pt]Credits[/b] killamess Graham

Mendorphins:

Not really - stumbled upon the worst bug of all time. Only one person can log in at a time, if I try to log in it kicks the other person out. My MAX_CONNECTIONS is set to 50 and all.

I spy, with my little eye; some anti-leech, that just might make me cry?

item.title: 56k-Hype
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

So I was asked if someone could login to the server to try it out, I said yes to see how stable it is mainly and to get some initial feedback - so if anyone is interested in playing for a bit (remember it’s not beta yet, just initial testing) I’ll leave it online for a day. Just PM me for the client. I’d like to know how I handle players on a 56k dial-up connection.

Hyperion was stable and smooth, so this should be.

Read full topic

item.title: 56k-Hype
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:25, topic:388566”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=484388.msg3551422#msg3551422 date=1301557596]
No it came like that. I want to eventually replace the item models with the classic looking ones though (might leave the NPCs as they are).

When I decide to develop my skills in modelling and client sided stuff, that is.
Is it me or are the .gifs not playing at all? Can anyone else see the .gif images move as a video sequence?
[/quote]

Yeah, it seems like the items are “brighter” than they should be.[/quote]
The client is Galkon’s client and it looks like he has changed nearly every item. The runes look like faded discs. I hate the models, but the client is built specifically for the server and I don’t fancy completely breaking the server.

There’s nothing over the top, just a bit different. I’ve already got used to it and so they look normal - it doesn’t spoil the gameplay too much.

Read full topic
